org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo -e ">>> Check if webnode container is running and stop it..." webnode=`docker container ls -a | grep webnode | wc -l` if [ "$webnode" -eq "1" ]; then docker container stop webnode docker container rm webnode fi
echo -e ">>> Start new webnode container..." cd /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/nginx sed -i 's/dob-php/phpnode/g' /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/nginx/conf/site.conf sed -i 's/dob-mysql/dbnode/g' /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/site/index.php docker image build -t webcontainer . docker container run -d --name webnode -p 8080:80 -v /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/site:/site --link phpnode:phnode webcontainer
